content: Glad to hear it helped you! Yeah, that’s of course a critical point, I probably didn’t enlarge upon enough. The solution is to prevent those passwords through software just like Gmail does. How I wrote, there are dictionaries with commonly used passwords, which can also be used by developers to detect and prevent those passwords from being used. This is just an obstacle for the user if he’s doing a mistake while the hopefully “normal” user won’t notice it.
